name: Code Gunner
description:
All assets made by me from scratch (Code, art & animations, music).

This game was made for the 2021 JLM jam.
The game utilizes the jam theme as such: Just because you can't easily solve issues with your gun, doesn't mean you shouldn't use your gun.

The game also utilizes 3 diversifiers, for the funsies: Under the Hood, Photograbetry and On Your Own.

The game was planned to have 2 more levels, and to have more than only 1 "proper" level (the "birds" level), but I ran out of time.
I also was busy the day before, so I started my own submission about 12 hours into the jam.
SFX were also neglected due to the time limit (had to make a game, right?)

Hope it's still fun :)
- Blawnode
